import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as chartData from '../../../../shared/data/dashboard/online-course' @Component({ selector: 'app-today-progress', templateUrl: './today-progress.component.html', styleUrls: ['./today-progress.component.scss'] }) export class TodayProgressComponent { public todayProgress = chartData.todayProgress constructor(){} }
